evidence.source_document: Order on Cross Motions for Summary Judgment
evidence.text: specific individuals, not indiscriminate force that will likely harm innocent persons known to be in the area, … • Competent deployment of impact weapons such as the 40mm impact munitions while wearing a gas mask, … Mr. Meyer, addressing the failure to train Ramos in deploying KIPs while wearing a gas mask, similarly opines: “The need for such training should be obvious…"
Ms. Ratlieff incurred and will incur for an indefinite time in the future, medical, hospital, and related expenses…
